short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant pop out the Howard The Alien meme

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Good luck to the Area 51 Raiders.

After a wild ride together with Howard FoxStudioLabs is going to discontinue the development of this extension. This is because the development is not what we want to be known for, We still thank you all for your dedication towards Howard. He will be proud of you!

Have you ever wanted to pop out the Howard the Alien meme at all times? Look no further. This extension will instantly pop out the original Howard The Alien meme.

Update 1.0.1:
> Minor bug fixes where some users couldn't render the video.

Update 1.2.0:
> Changed video destination to a better place

Update 1.2.0.8:
> Changed video location towards the extension itself so it no longer requires the storage permission
